meta.title: Your Name - Software Engineer
meta.description: Software Engineer building scalable systems and clean code. Replace with your own description.

about.name: Your Name
about.bio: Software engineer with experience building web applications, APIs, and distributed systems. Passionate about clean code, testing, and shipping products that scale. Replace this bio with your own.

bullets: Designed and shipped APIs serving millions of requests per day with <100ms p99 latency.
Led migration of legacy services to microservices; reduced deployment time by 40%.
Mentored 3 engineers and established code review and testing best practices.
Built internal tooling for monitoring and alerting used across 5+ teams.
Developed features for a cloud product used by enterprise customers; improved onboarding completion by 25%.
Implemented automated testing pipeline reducing flaky tests by 60%.
Collaborated with PM and design to ship user-facing features on a quarterly release cycle.
Optimized database queries and caching layer, cutting page load time by 30%.
Built and maintained services for a high-traffic e-commerce platform.
Participated in on-call rotation and improved runbooks; reduced incident resolution time by 20%.
Wrote design docs and led technical discussions for a new internal API.
Contributed to open-source libraries used by the team for configuration and logging.

blogs.title: Writing Clean Code
blogs.excerpt: Principles and practices for readable, maintainable code. Naming, functions, comments, and formatting that scale with your team.

blogs.title: Introduction to System Design
blogs.excerpt: Scaling from a single server to distributed systems. Load balancing, caching, databases, and trade-offs.

expertise.title: Backend & APIs
expertise.description: REST and GraphQL APIs, service-oriented architecture, message queues. Languages: Java, Python, Go, or Node.js depending on your stack.

expertise.title: Frontend
expertise.description: React, Vue, or similar. Responsive UI, state management, and performance. Replace with your preferred stack.

expertise.title: Databases
expertise.description: SQL and NoSQL. Schema design, indexing, and query optimization. PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis.

expertise.title: DevOps & Tooling
expertise.description: CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, monitoring. GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar. Cloud-native deployment.

expertise.title: Testing & Quality
expertise.description: Unit, integration, and e2e tests. TDD, code coverage, and maintaining quality at scale.

expertise.title: Cloud
expertise.description: AWS, GCP, or Azure. Compute, storage, serverless. Replace with your experience.

projects.title: REST API / Backend Service
projects.description: A sample backend or API project. Add your own description, tech stack, and link to repo or demo.

projects.title: Full-Stack App
projects.description: Example full-stack application. Replace with your project: frontend, backend, and what you learned.

projects.title: Open Source / Side Project
projects.description: Contribution or side project. Add link and description. Remove or duplicate cards as needed.
